Rancorous Smite.name: Rancorous Smite
Rancorous Smite.flavor: Enraged by the harm done to your companions, you force your enemy to repay the debt in blood.
Rancorous Smite.attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each bloodied ally within your line of sight.

Scrape the Sky.name: Scrape the Sky
Scrape the Sky.flavor: Fury fills you, and you tower over your enemies.
Scrape the Sky.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your reach and speed both increase by 1, and your melee attacks deal 2d6 extra damage.

Every Wrong Righted.name: Every Wrong Righted
Every Wrong Righted.flavor: You channel your smoldering resentment into a savage strike and inspire your allies to finish the job.
Every Wrong Righted.onMiss: Half damage, and each ally adjacent to you gains a +3 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the start of your next turn.
Every Wrong Righted.effect: You and each ally adjacent to you can spend a healing surge.
